#### Request for Information

The Government of Canada, represented by Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC), is seeking information from respondents on their potential ability to provide an automatic translation solution using cutting-edge technologies. The desired solution must be able to translate meteorological jargon in alerts with high fidelity (no loss of language quality in both Canadian French and English).
